meico.app.gui

Class Workspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent

              • meico.app.gui.Workspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    class Workspace
extends javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane
    This part of the interface will be the place where all the data is shown, dropped, converted, ...
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

      • silentDeactivationOfAllSoundbanks

        protected void silentDeactivationOfAllSoundbanks()
        This deactivates all soundbanks in the workspace, but only visually. It does not force the midiplayer to load a default soundbank so the one that is currently loaded will still be used for MIDI synthesis. But now another soundbank can be loaded and set active without worrying about the others.

      • getActiveSoundbank

        protected java.io.File getActiveSoundbank()
        returns the soundbank that is currently used for MIDI synthesis so that it may also be used for MIDI to audio rendering
        Returns:
